In this episode I sit down with Thomas Bryant from Commvault to explore one of the most critical topics in modern cybersecurity: identity protection and recovery in Active Directory and Microsoft Entra.

- Commvault Active Directory: [https://www.commvault.com/supported-t‚Ä¶](https://www.youtube.com/redirect?event=video_description&redir_token=QUFFLUhqbXM5T2MzczlBN0dIWmdXSnE5bWg3SnppakU4Z3xBQ3Jtc0trQXdwSWRXNk52YXBmb2dYRnNPTXR1LXZqQmhPUjVjaEY0Y0lyeE1EUTYzcnptU0hsREtjWUI3Q2gxaE5WRW1CNlppeVJRNktFaEMxQXdrejBkVnNuVXpodVBoandmcVJXWnhHaTFDU21hS2RyNkV1cw&q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.commvault.com%2Fsupported-technologies%2Factive-directory&v=cuBNMU52XBM)

üîê What We Cover:

- Why identity is the new security perimeter‚Äîand why it‚Äôs under constant threat
- The risks of compromised AD and Entra environments
- The importance of resilience and recoverability in identity infrastructure
- How Commvault‚Äôs solutions can help safeguard and restore these vital assets

üí° Whether you‚Äôre an IT leader, security architect, or just passionate about protecting digital identities, this episode is packed with practical insights and expert perspectives.

### About the Author / [Thomas Maurer](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/author/d9pe/)

Thomas works as a Principal Program Manager & Chief Evangelist Azure Hybrid at Microsoft (Cloud + AI). He engages with the community and customers around the world to share his knowledge and collect feedback to improve the Azure hybrid cloud and edge platform. Prior to joining the Azure engineering team (Cloud + AI), Thomas was a Lead Architect and Microsoft MVP, to help architect, implement and promote Microsoft cloud technology.
